index.title: Your Ancient Auto Alchemist :)
index.subTitle: Welcome to 01 Car Hub, where you'll find checklists to empower you with knowledge and help you make informed decisions about your next car purchase.

about.p1: I've put together these checklists to make car buying a whole lot easier.
about.p2: They've worked like a charm for me, and I hope they do the same for you!
